Package prover.gui.jobs

Provides some facilities to implement Jobs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAppendJob Jobs to append some text to viewers.
 

Class Summary
AppendJob A job to add some text to the specified document.
ColorAppendJob A Job to append some text with the specified color.
ProverStatus A class to ease the returning of status for the Jobs.
SimpleAppendJob A Job to append text to the specified document contained in a viewer.
 

Package prover.gui.jobs Description

Provides some facilities to implement Jobs. These Jobs are mostly here to append some text to the current proof view with the right color.

See Also:
UIJob
